channel.title: Comments on: Book Review: Perceiving the Direction of Play

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Yeah. Definitely not recommended for kyu players. If you really want to get a book on direction of play, definitely check out my review on Direction of Play from Kiseido. It's still a bit advanced, but I think it's much more in line with teaching someone direction of play than this book. And for your second question, I realized that I didn't actually finish my thought on the second bullet, so it's updated now. Let me know if you have any other questions. =)
item.content:encoded:
Yeah. Definitely not recommended for kyu players. If you really want to get a book on direction of play, definitely check out my review on Direction of Play from Kiseido. It’s still a bit advanced, but I think it’s much more in line with teaching someone direction of play than this book.
And for your second question, I realized that I didn’t actually finish my thought on the second bullet, so it’s updated now. Let me know if you have any other questions. =)

item.title: By: RisingStar
item.dc:creator: RisingStar
item.description: So what you're saying is that we (kyu players) shouldn't read it? I still need to work on my direction of play so can you recommend any other books at the moment?
item.content:encoded: So what you’re saying is that we (kyu players) shouldn’t read it? I still need to work on my direction of play so can you recommend any other books at the moment?
